content: are you feeling the pumpkin spice vibe knit yourself a whole pumpkin patch of happy pumpkins difficulty novice knitter seamless construction knit in the round photo & video stitch guides to help you along the way ------------------ the teal pumpkin project due to the very real danger that food allergies and sensitivities cause many children can not participate fully in halloween trick or treating consider offering non-candy items for trick or treaters such as glow sticks stickers etc so that all children may join in the fun consider knitting your pumpkin in teal to proudly display to alert trick or treaters that it is safe for all children to visit your home and join in the fun or knit in orange to show your love for all things fall skill level approximately 19″ diameter advanced beginner size approximately 19″ diameter 7″ tall including the stem gauge 16 stitches / 26 row = 4″ needles size 6 4mm double pointed needles or 24″ circular using magic loop for the increases and decreases yarn worsted weight yarn 20 yrds white stem & leaf 100 yrds teal pumpkin we recommend twice sheared sheep everyday merino notions 10 stitch markers row counter recommended 60g fiber fill stuffing scissors darning needle
